title: Want some peanuts? The Norfolk Noon Kiwanis can hook you up
title_page: Want some peanuts? The Norfolk Noon Kiwanis can hook you up
maintext:
Want some peanuts? The Norfolk Noon Kiwanis can hook you up
NORFOLK - Peanut lovers listen up because the Norfolk Noon Kiwanis will be going door to door throughout Norfolk October 3rd to sell a wide variety of peanuts for Peanut Day.
President Jarad Dahlkoetter says a few favorites they’re selling include roasted peanuts, trail mix, and chocolate covered peanuts with the prices ranging from $5 to $25.
Dahlkoetter says the money raised from the day funds their entire year.
“The money raised helps us give back to the community. Every single month we donate to a different organization such as the Rescue Mission, Backpack Program, or the Salvation Army. We give to just about every organization that has anything to do with children in the community.”
Dahlkoetter says on October 3rd all 90 members split up and go door to door all around Norfolk to sell peanuts.
If you would like to pre-order peanuts call (402) 640-3999.
